ground_truth_reviews.comment: The current revenue calculation is incorrect as it does not align with the business logic for 'monthly revenue'. The aggregation logic must be updated to: 1) Only include orders with a 'delivered' status. 2) Subtract any refunded amounts from the order total. 3) Separate revenue from 'product' sales and 'subscription' fees, as these are tracked as distinct KPIs.

title: feat: Add monthly revenue reporting method
body: This PR introduces a new service method, `get_monthly_revenue`, to calculate the total revenue for a specified month. It aggregates order totals to provide a high-level financial summary. See https://github.com/Reviewate/benchmark/issues/70
